name: Quality Clouds
slogan: We help companies to govern their SaaS investments, from development to production
description:
Quality Clouds for SaaS platforms is a product that help large and medium enterprises to govern their SaaS investments to ensure development and configuration are done in the right way and also, to monitor the user adoption of these platforms.
Connectors available today: ServiceNow, Salesforce and Office365
marketTags: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

jobs.title: Java / PHP Senior Developer – Barcelona
jobs.description:
Quality Clouds is a SaaS startup with an automated code review solution for SaaS platforms. We are a very young company looking for people eager to learn and work in a very dynamic and technical environment. 

Quality Clouds is looking for a PHP Senior Developer with strong knowledge of Java to join our team in Barcelona. 

About the role

Main responsibilities

Being part of an Agile team of developers, software architects and SaaS platform experts whose mission is to build a market-leading software product. 
Relevant participation in our SCRUM meetings contributing both by producing top quality code and by providing input into the technical design of the product. 
Contributing mainly to the back end layer (Java based, with heavy use of the Spring framework), together with the development of the admin portal, API layers and other vendor specific integration modules (PHP based, Laravel Framework)
About you

Education

University Degree or final years, or equivalent relevant work experience.
Experience

Have an established track record of producing high quality software.
5 years+ hands on experience in Java-based server side projects.
3 years of hands on experience with PHP server side development, especially with the Laravel framework
Expert knowledge of key Java language programming concepts: Thread Safety, Generics, Java 8 and later, and Lambda Expressions and experience using MySQL database as backend for Java applications
Deep knowledge of the Spring Framework such as  Spring Core, Spring Testing, Spring Data Access, Spring Integration.
Full proficiency in SDLC tools for Java development – Maven, Unit Testing frameworks (including Mock Object frameworks), Continuous Integration tools (Jenkins)
Preferred Qualifications

Familiarity with AWS platform – S3, EC2, AMI definition and management
Experience with DevOps tools and techniques (Continuous Delivery, Containerization products)
Advanced knowledge of static code analysis tools (SonarQube, Google Closure Compiler) and the theory behind them (code parsers, AST generators)
Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS (preferably) or Google Cloud Platform is a plus. 
Experience with low code SaaS platforms such as Salesforce.com, ServiceNow, Office 365 (especially Dynamics 365 and SharePoint online), Appian, Mendix, etc is a significant plus.
Abilities

Passionate about code and code quality
Excellent organizational and communication skills. 
Motivation to achieve results in a fast-paced environment. 
High creativity, great analytical reasoning skills and passion for software and software quality.
What we offer

Real development opportunities
Permanent contract
Dynamic environment
Competitive salary

jobs.title: Salesforce Developer – Barcelona
jobs.description:
Quality Clouds is a SaaS startup with an automated code review solution for SaaS platforms. We are a very young company looking for people eager to learn and work in a very dynamic and technical environment.

Quality Clouds is looking for a Salesforce developer with administration skills to join our team in Barcelona. If you’re excited by the opportunity to work in a startup with cutting edge cloud computing technology, then this is the place to be.

The Salesforce Developer will join an Agile team of developers, software architects and SaaS platform experts whose mission is to build a market-leading software product. He or she will be expected to contribute in the following areas:

About the role

Lead the evolution of our Quality Clouds for Salesforce product, in collaboration with our backend and frontend development teams
Design and build the Quality Clouds Salesforce AppExchange Application, which will directly integrate customer Salesforce instances with our product
Lead the Quality Assurance stream of work for Quality Clouds for Salesforce
Ensure that Quality Clouds for Salesforce stays up to date with new Salesforce releases and functionality
Provide consultancy on interpreting the results of Quality Clouds for Salesforce scans for our clients

Although not required, experience with, or interest in becoming proficient in other low code SaaS platforms such as ServiceNow, Office 365, etc will be a significant plus.

A successful candidate will have an established track record of developing high quality applications on the Salesforce platform and a deep understanding of the platform’s architecture, capabilities and limitations. Also, excellent organizational and communication skills, a motivation to achieve results in a fast-paced environment, high creativity, great analytical reasoning skills, and a passion for software and software quality are required to succeed in this position. This role is based in our Barcelona office and will provide opportunities to work with international partners and customers.

About you

Basic Qualifications

– University Degree or final years, or equivalent relevant work experience.
– Passionate about code and code quality.
– 3 years+ hands on experience developing and administering the Salesforce platform
– Knows and understands the reasoning behind Salesforce development and customization best practices
– Deep knowledge of Salesforce architecture, components, and Software Development Lifecycle management
– Deep Knowledge of APEX, VisualForce, REST and SOAP integrations
– Experience with Lightning and Salesforce DX

Preferred Qualifications

– Familiarity with AWS platform at a user level
– Some knowledge of the Java Programming language and the Spring framework
– Experience with of one or more low code development platforms (ServiceNow, Appian, Mendix, etc…)

What we offer

Real development opportunities
Permanent contract
Dynamic environment
Competitive salary
